name: BlockSlider
description:
UDATE#1 NEW LEVELS

Some bug fixes, New Objects, New Main and Credit Screen, Pause Menu, Level Selection.

BlockSlider is in VERRY early development, Right now there are only 15 levels and there is one bug that will crash the game that I'm trying to fix.  Adding more levels soon.

Here's a Description of what it's about:

BlockSlider is about You being a box and well you slide across a piece of land and try to dodge objects, There's Falling Blocks, moving Blocks and ghost Blocks.
